title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Balance of Payments Survey)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Balance of Payments Survey) 

Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (balance payment survey) order 2020

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“asset”, in relation to a person, includes a financial claim of the person; 

“quarter” means a period of 3 months ending on 31 March, 30 June, 30 
September or 31 December in any year; 

1 OJ L 318, 27.11.1998, p. 8. 
2 OJ L 269, 14.10.2009, p. 1. 
3 OJ L 64, 7.3.2015, p. 6. 
4 OJ L 35, 8.2.2005, p. 23. 
5 OJ L 106, 19.4.2006, p. 10. 
6 OJ L 311, 21.11.2008, p. 1. 
7 OJ L 204, 6.8.2009, p. 204. 
8 OJ L 166, 27.6.2012, p. 22. 
9 OJ L 158, 10.6.2013, p. 74. 
10 OJ L 171, 29.6.2016, p. 144. 
11 OJ L 85, 27.3.2019, p. 1. 
12 OJ L 174, 26.6.2013, p. 1. 
13 OJ L 207, 4.8.2015, p. 35. 
14 OJ L 91, 29.3.2019, p. 19. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st March, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [91] 3 

“Regulations” means Council Regulation (EC) No. 2533/98 of 23 
November 19981, as amended by Council Regulation (EC) No. 951/2009 
of 9 October 20092 and Council Regulation (EU) 2015/373 of 5 March 
20153, Regulation (EC) No. 184/2005 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 12 January 20054, as amended by Commission Regulation 
(EC) No. 602/2006 of 18 April 20065, Regulation (EC) No. 1137/2008 
of the European Parliament and of the Council of 22 October 20086, 
Commission Regulation (EC) No. 707/2009 of 5 August 20097, 
Commission Regulation (EU) No. 555/2012 of 22 June 20128, 
Commission Regulation (EU) No. 519/2013 of 21 February 20139, 
Regulation (EU) 2016/1013 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 8 June 201610 and Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 
2019/505 of 19 December 201811, Regulation (EU) No. 549/2013 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 21 May 201312, as amended 
by Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2015/1342 of 22 April 
201513 and Regulation (EU) 2019/516 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 19 March 201914; 

“resident” means a person residing in the State and “non-resident” shall 
be construed accordingly; 

“survey” means the Balance of Payments Survey that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office in order to obtain information set out in Part 2 
of the Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the 
Regulations. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulations has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulations, except 
where the context otherwise requires.

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 3. This Order applies to a person -
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a person - 

(a) 

(b) 

engaged in, or 

acting on behalf of a person engaged in, 

any transaction specified in Part 1 of the Schedule.
text_norm: 3 order applies person - (a) (b) engaged acting behalf person engaged transaction specified part 1 schedule

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 4. A requirement on persons to whom this Order applies -
text_raw:
4. A requirement on persons to whom this Order applies - 

(a) 

subject to paragraph (b), to provide, for the purposes of the 
survey, information the general nature of which is specified in 
Part 2 of the Schedule in relation to each year in the period from 
2020 to 2024, and 

(b) 

to provide the information in relation to each year in the period 
referred to in paragraph (a), once only, 

is hereby prescribed. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [91]
text_norm: 4 requirement person order applies - (a) subject paragraph (b) provide purpose survey information general nature specified part 2 schedule relation year period 2020 2024 (b) provide information relation year period referred paragraph (a) hereby prescribed 4 91

title: relation to paragraph 2 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 5. (1) This Article applies on a particular date to a person to whom this Order
text_raw:
5. (1) This Article applies on a particular date to a person to whom this Order 
applies where, in the period of 24 months immediately preceding that date, either 
or both of the following requirements are fulfilled in respect of the person: 

(a) on any day in that period, the total assets of the person exceeded 

€150 million; 

(b) 

the sale of goods or provision of services by the person in any 12 
month period in that period amounted to not less than €100 
million. 

(2) A requirement on persons to whom this Article applies - 

(a) 

subject to paragraph (b), to provide, for the purposes of the 
survey, information the general nature of which is specified in 
Part 2 of the Schedule in relation to each quarter in the period 
from 1 January 2020 to 31 December 2024, and 

(b) 

to provide the information in relation to each quarter in the period 
referred to in paragraph (a), once only, 

is hereby prescribed. 

 
 
 
 
 SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

[91] 5 

Article 3 

Transactions to which Article 3 refers: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

sale of goods or provision of services to non-residents; 

receipt of goods or services from non-residents; 

acquisition or disposal of a financial claim against non-residents; 

(d) 

incurrence or redemption of a financial liability to non-residents; 

(e) 

payment of income to non-residents; 

(f) 

receipt of income from non-residents. 

Part 2 

Articles 4 and 5

text_raw:
2.

questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director General for the 
collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1.
